venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
This month, I want to try something a little different.

I'm going to open the floor for anyone to briefly present what they have been working on. Sign-up for demos will happen from 6:30-7:00 during the food / socializing portion of the evening. At 7:00, we'll start the first demo.

Depending on the number of volunteers, each person will have 5 to 10 minutes to do their demonstration. Generally, I'd prefer to see demos that consist of code or a running application rather than slides.

I look forward to seeing what everyone is working on.

Doug
item.name: Demo Night - Monthly Boston Java Meetup
